text: Chuck Swirsky (born January 30, 1954) is an American-Canadian sportscaster. He is the voice of the Chicago Bulls and former voice of the Toronto Raptors. He was the voice of the Michigan Wolverines football and basketball teams. He hosted The Chuck Swirsky Show as well as the studio host for the Chicago Bears Radio Network. On January 14, 2008, Swirsky became a Canadian citizen. ==References== Category:College football broadcasters Category:National Basketball Association broadcasters Category:National Football League broadcasters Category:College basketball broadcasters Category:Living people Category:1954 births Category:American bloggers
title: Chuck Swirsky
